ovdesc.p: This table stores the non-working days for currencies for a particular country or for all countries.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.CURRENCYNONWORKINGDAY.
This table stores the exceptions. If a date is not a holiday, it will not be stored in this table.

desc.p: Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.

The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates if the entered Date is a weekend holiday or not.
Y - Indicates the entered Date is a weekend holiday.
N - Indicates the entered Date is a not a weekend holiday.
Blank - Indicates the entered Date is a not a weekend holiday.

Contains valid country code for which holiday is defined.
